title: [Large-Scale] Reflective Language Education Design for Social Justice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of social justice concepts
context.additional_context: Social justice education based on reflective design using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze cases of social inequality and perform critical reflection through linguistic expression
Learners can improve linguistic practices in educational and professional settings based on awareness of power dynamics
Learners can evaluate their language use patterns through reflective journals and propose revision strategies from a social justice perspective
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
